summary.p:
This manuscript contains two chapters of the Dharmaśāstra work Smṛtimuktāphala by Vaidyanātha Dīkṣita copied for Ducler in 1830-1831 by Śorakkuḍi (Tamil Curakkuṭi) Kṛṣṇaśasāstrin (U2) and Nārāyaṇa (?) (U4):
The Prāyaścittakāṇḍa, Adhyāya 6 of the Smṛtimuktāphala (U2).
The Varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇa, Adhyāya 1 of the Smṛtimuktāphala (U4).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (January 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil foliation {1}, 2-87 for U2, {1}, 2-230 for U4. Continuous parallel Arabic foliation 1-317 for U2 and U4. No foliation for U1 and U3.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Verso blank. 380 x 35 mm.
87 folios = Smṛtimuktāphala, Prāyaścittakāṇḍa. Tamil foliation {1}, 2-87. Parallel Arabic foliation 1-87. 380 x 35 mm.
5 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso, except an unblackened piḷḷaiyār cūḻi (f[1]r, lm). 380 x 35 mm.
230 folios = Smṛtimuktāphala, Varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇa. Tamil foliation {1}, 2-230. Parallel Arabic foliation 88-317. 380/385 x 35 mm.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year vikṛti of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1830-1831. See colophons (U2, f87v5).

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 92.

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. “Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique.” Journal asiatique 10, p. 84-91. — See p. 91, no. 37.
Cabaton, A. 1907. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits sanscrits et pālis. 1er fascicule. Manuscrits sanscrits. Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des manuscrits.. Paris: Leroux. — See p. 135, no. 818.
Rodet, Léon & Feer, Léon. 1872-. Catalogue des manuscrits sanscrits en écriture grantha. Manuscript, BnF Sanscrit 1775.1. — See f. 5r, no. 6.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
